title: API exposure for Test CTS
body:
### Context

Test team needs to be able to obtain list of all MSBuild files influencing build of particular output binaries.
I created dirty prototype to base this work on: https://github.com/JanKrivanek/BinlogCrawl
In order to make it more usable/relibale, we need to expose or wrap and expose EnumerateProperties and EnumerateItems
